title: compliance management
extract: Compliance management is the process which ensures that a set of people are following a given set of rules. The rules are referred to as the compliance standard or compliance benchmark, while the process is what manages their compliance. Compliance management can take many forms.
extract_html: Compliance management is the process which ensures that a set of people are following a given set of rules. The rules are referred to as the compliance standard or compliance benchmark, while the process is what manages their compliance. Compliance management can take many forms.
